articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: How did 'locked' intruder escape from Saif Ali Khan's flat? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Mohammad Shariful Islam Shehzad, a Bangladeshi national who had illegally entered India and changed his name to Bijoy Das, was arrested today from Thane. | Latest News India
articles.content: The Mumbai police on Sunday revealed how the alleged intruder who stabbed Saif Ali Khan entered and exited the actor's apartment on January 16. The police said Khan and his staff had locked him insid… [+2528 chars]
